venue.name: Riverview Restaurant at the Hudson Portuguese Club

item.description:
There is a Fado and dinner event at the Hudson Portuguese Club on September 10 on the eve of their big weekend long festival.

The cost for this event is $35 and includes music and all courses (appetizers, entree, dessert, and wine!)

Please purchase your tickets directly online via the Hudson Portuguese Club web site at

www.hudsonportugueseclub.org

To see the promotional poster and more details for this event go to

www.hudsonportugueseclub.org/fados2010poster.pdf

For more information about the singer, go to
www.nathaliepires.com/

Please note the reservation field when you purchase your tickets, so I know that you are definitely coming and to arrange your seat with the group.

if the online reservation asks you to give a group name, please give my name, Joana de Sousa.

I am looking forward to this event and in seeing familiar and new faces.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Fado Music and Dinner Night in Hudson
